data.eml:eml: A check-list of the centipedes of the Balkan peninsula with some taxonomic notes and a complete bibliography (Chilopoda)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article P. Stoev (1997): A check-list of the centipedes of the Balkan peninsula with some taxonomic notes and a complete bibliography (Chilopoda). Entomologica Scandinavica 51: 87-105, URL: http://un.availab.le
